trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_000<tab>Ye look like one o' them adventurin' folk. Doin' a bit of explorin', are ye?
TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_010<tab>Me? I'm just yer run-o'-the-mill merchant, peddlin' me grog here in Aleport.

TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_011<tab>With all the ships what sunk durin' the Calamity, I feared me tradin' days were at an end. We managed to hold on somehow, though, an' brought the place back from the brink.
TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_012<tab>Hard times, it was. Thought I'd have to sell off the old family residence fer a while there.
TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_020<tab>Aleport? Well, it's a port...what deals in ale, mostly.

TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_021<tab>We do a modest trade in other goods, but seein' as Aleport has a lower tax on grog, it ain't hard to understand why all the liquor merchants come here.

TEXT_REGSEAALEPORT_00116_KAIZOPORAIZO_000_022<tab>We also get a lot o' tradin' vessels lookin' to stock up on our merry brew─water'll turn stale on a long voyage, ye see, so any captain worthy o' the name'll want a few barrels o' the good stuff loaded into his hold.
